epic.name: Epic Cosmos
epic.description: Cosmos is a dataset created in collaboration with a community of Epic health systems representing more than 300 million patient records from over 1633 hospitals and 37,900 clinics from all 50 states, D.C., Canada, Lebanon, and Saudi Arabia. Summary statistics were obtained using the SlicerDicer tool in Epic Cosmos.
